EmailTemplate.name: System Update JP en
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: PASSWORD UPDATE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Beta Tester, You may be experiencing some issues logging into the DAZN app but don't worry we will get you back to enjoying the live action on DAZN shortly. We have experienced a technical issue which requires you to your change your password. Please use the following link [ forgot email] and input your email address to receive a Reset Password email straight to your inbox. We recommend you change your password to a memorable password. Remember we are always here If you have questions, run into any issues or just want to send us some feedback. Please contact our customer service team and we will get back to you in a timely manner. Please enjoy your time watching DAZN! Thank you, Your DAZN team
DATENSCHUTZ | NUTZUNGSBEDINGUNGEN
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
